import { Row } from "antd"; import { withTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import { Slide } from "react-awesome-reveal"; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import { GenContainer, BlockContainer, Content, ContentWrapper, ContentWrapperTitle, ContentTitle, } from "./styles"; const Card = () => { return (

Thousands of possibilities

The Okto project is a gateway to a future bigger project. So who does he have in the mint? HUMAN The MekaVerse is a collection of 8,888 generative Mekas with hundreds of elements inspired by the Japan Mecha universes. Each artwork is original, with its own color palette and creation. The objective was to make each Meka unique in order to prioritize quality above quantity. TROLL The MekaVerse is a collection of 8,888 generative Mekas with hundreds of elements inspired by the Japan Mecha universes. Each artwork is original, with its own color palette and creation. The objective was to make each Meka unique in order to prioritize quality above quantity. PHANTOM The MekaVerse is a collection of 8,888 generative Mekas with hundreds of elements inspired by the Japan Mecha universes. Each artwork is original, with its own color palette and creation. The objective was to make each Meka unique in order to prioritize quality above quantity. ); }; export default withTranslation()(Card);
